0011111101110001 1110110100111011 1 -> sum: 0010110010101101, cout: 1
1101010100010000 1101100110111001 0 -> sum: 1010111011001001, cout: 1
1011010101111000 1000001010111001 1 -> sum: 0011100000110010, cout: 1
1000010011110011 0010101000010110 1 -> sum: 1010111100001010, cout: 0
0001100001000110 1101110111111010 1 -> sum: 1111011001000001, cout: 0
0100110011010000 0111100000110101 1 -> sum: 1100010100000110, cout: 0

1111111111111111 1111111111111111 1 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 1
0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
